Usage¶

Installation¶

You can download everything (code, documentation, dataset) from the GitHub repository

Dependencies¶

Brainage’s programs import other libraries that are needed to guarantee the correct functioning of the library. Such dependencies are listed here:

*argparse *numpy *loguru.logger *matplotlib.pyplot *keras.Sequential *keras.layers *sklearn.model_selection.train_test_split *sklearn.model_selection.KFold *sklearn.metrics.mean_absolute_error *sklearn.mean_squared_error, *sklearn.r2_score *sklearn.preprocessing.StandardScaler *sklearn.gaussian_process.GaussianProcessRegressor *sklearn.linear_model.LinearRegression

BrainAge
